title: News, Heroes Trivia Showdown!
itunes:title: News, Heroes Trivia Showdown!
description:
A room filled with some heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler -- breaks down the latest offseason headlines, including Charles Tillman's new contract with the Carolina Panthers and Michael Bennett standing by his "soft" comments about new Seattle Seahawks teammate Jimmy Graham. Elsewhere, the gang calls Huca Poos to check in with Wess in Tybee and engages in a trivia battle for the ages.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
